sentences.en: A large plate came skimming out , straight at the footman's head.
sentences.cn: 一只大盘子直向听差的脑袋飞来.

sentences.en: Cupid draws his arrow on both footman and pharaoh.
sentences.cn: 爱神丘比特的箭已瞄准了沐浴在爱河中的人们.

sentences.en: Footman: Bah! We shouldn't even be here! Or siding with the orcs.
sentences.cn: 步兵: 呸! 我们根柢就不该来这儿! 还和兽族联手.

sentences.en: Footman: Murlocs? Here? They must have an encampment nearby!
sentences.cn: 步兵: 莫洛克? (鱼人种族)竟然在这儿? 附近一定有它们的营地!

sentences.en: He picked up his glass and emptied it, and the footman came forward to refill it.
sentences.cn: 他拿起酒杯,一饮而尽后侍从又为他斟满.

sentences.en: He saw her, encircled by mother, footman, maid, and porter, take her seat and drive away.
sentences.cn: 他看见她被她母亲 、 马车夫 、 女仆和脚夫簇拥着, 坐上车,走了.

sentences.en: He was at cuffs with a brother footman.
I am my own footman and parlour - maid for the moment.
sentences.cn: 目前我是我自己的男仆和客厅侍女.

sentences.en: She sat down and accepted a glass from the footman.
sentences.cn: 她坐下来,从仆人手里接过杯子.

sentences.en: The footman and two porters began to load luggage onto the carriage.
sentences.cn: 仆人和两个脚夫开始把行李抬上马车.

sentences.en: The footman went ahead against the hurricane.
sentences.cn: 那男仆顶着飓风继续前进.

sentences.en: They were bowed out by the footman.
sentences.cn: 他们由男仆毕恭毕敬地送出去.

sentences.en: Week of Footman : Double growth for Footmen and Swordsmen.
sentences.cn: 步兵周: 步兵与剑士产量加倍.

sentences.en: Why, will the black footman tell tales?
sentences.cn: 怎么?黑人随从会搬弄是非 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: a male servant in the past who opened the front door, announced the names of visitors etc
